text: By the end of the year, Apple will not have shipped equivalent features for the Apple Intelligence features shown at WWDC 2024
full-pick-text: By the end of the year, Apple will not have shipped equivalent features for the Apple Intelligence features shown at WWDC 2024. Craig Federighi will talk at least once more about there being '2 architectures.' Apple will once again promise that the missing features will be shipping by the end of the next year. Actions across apps is one of the features that will not ship.
notes:
• "Craig Federighi will talk at least once more about there being '2 architectures.'"
  • "Apple will once again promise that the missing features will be shipping by the end of the next year."
  • "Actions across apps is one of the features that will not ship."
